title: 求教怎么修改装备的损害值得材质···
author: sun_small
txt_content:
如题求教怎么修改装备的损害值得材质···

比如说RPG背包中的，不加他那材质包，看什么都是钻石稿子。

这材质要怎么做啊 ？  有没有教程之类的？

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-694674-1-1.html
这个是原版的，根据物品的损伤修改，从资源包看起...
那个json一般长这样...{
  "parent": "item/handheld",
  "textures": {
    "layer0": "items/diamond_axe"
  },
  "overrides": [
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0}, "model": "item/diamond_axe"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.0006402048655569782}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_body_low"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.0012804097311139564}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_head_low"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.0019206145966709346}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_part1"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.002560819462227913}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_part2"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.003201024327784891}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_part3"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.0038412291933418692}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_part4"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.004481434058898847}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_part5"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.005121638924455826}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_part6"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.005761843790012804}, "model": "block/custom/sunfl/sunfl_part7"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.006402048655569782}, "model": "block/custom/mobs/sunfl/head"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.00704225352112676}, "model": "block/custom/test/base_test_64_1color"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.0076824583866837385}, "model": "block/custom/mobs/sunfl/stem"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.008322663252240717}, "model": "block/custom/mobs/sunfl/stem_2"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.008962868117797694}, "model": "block/custom/mobs/sunfl/stem_3"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.009603072983354673}, "model": "block/custom/mobs/sunfl/stem_4"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.010243277848911651}, "model": "block/custom/mobs/sunfl/stem_5"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.01088348271446863}, "model": "block/custom/mobs/sunfl/bone"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.011523687580025609}, "model": "block/custom/mobs/sunfl/bone_2"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.026248399487836107}, "model": "block/custom/test/block_white"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.026888604353393086}, "model": "block/custom/test/block_black"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.027528809218950064}, "model": "block/custom/test/invis_layer"},
        { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.046734955185659406}, "model": "block/custom/myskull"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.998719590268886}, "model": "block/custom/sep/hk1"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 0, "damage": 0.999359795134443}, "model": "block/custom/sep/ab1"},
    { "predicate": {"damaged": 1, "damage": 0}, "model": "item/diamond_axe"}
  ]
}复制代码

至于optifine/mcpatcher的办法
type=item
items=276■物品ID
texture=brokenknight_long_sword■材质包/assets/minecraft/mcpatcher/cit下此文本保存位置的贴图名字
damage=5■损伤值复制代码参考

至于后面那个高清方法 我好好研究一下 ，谢谢你了

盔甲的材质能修改不？  就是修改穿在身上的材质

replies.author: sun_small
replies.txt_content:
⊙v⊙ 发表于 2018-2-4 11:44
材质包这个位置assets\minecraft\models\item
新建名为diamond_axe文本，修改后缀为json，打开并输入以下， ...
  这么小呀？ 能放大点不？？

装备的话原版不能改...写死的
